[汁]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *kjub ): semantic 氵 ( “ water ” ) + phonetic 十 ( OC *ɡjub ) . It expresses the idea of a liquid. [ 1 ]

[協]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ɦleːb ): phonetic 十 ( OC *ɡjub ) + phonetic 劦 ( OC *ɦleːb , “ to collaborate ” ) — a variant form of 劦 with a phonetic 十 added. [ 1 ]

[协]
Simplified from 協 ( 劦 → 办 )
